MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH7  postcode area of Mold, affecting properties in Pen-Y-Felin and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of grounded overhead cables and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:16pm on 10th November 2020
